value: UNIT 9 34-38 VICTORIA PARADE, MANLY, 2095, NSW, Australia

7353 - Heavy Construction Equipment Rental and Leasing Summary > MELROSE CRANES & RIGGING PTY. LTD. is an Australian proprietary company. Its operations cover heavy construction equipment rental and leasing. The company is not involved in the import or export of goods. MELROSE CRANES & RIGGING PTY. LTD. is headquartered in Manly, New South Wales. It is headed by managing director & company secretary Gregg Peter Melrose. For the 2023 financial year, the company reported revenue of $36.62 million. Its net loss totalled $272,000. MELROSE CRANES & RIGGING PTY. LTD. forms part of the services industry sector.
